column5: I just had to share this video with OFNers.  It's a hoot.    Pam
Way Kewl.....  Good find ..  One discrepancy though ...lol...i think Tim Hortons is owned by Americans...and we probably should apologize for Bill Shatner too
Hi ya Pam  Very cool  Love the crack about Deon.HAHAHAHAHA
Awww man I thought he was from the USA all these years..... Can we please have him.... we promise we will return him when we are done playing with him. What if we send Spock can we trade?  Art
yup you can have him ...if you want to send someone up here ...send back Pam Anderson...ive got a BONE to pick with her...j/k

not for much longer  "Return to Canada  On June 29, 2009, Tim Hortons Inc. announced that, pending shareholder approval (expected in September), the chain's operations would be reorganized under a new publicly-traded company, also named "Tim Hortons Inc.", incorporated under the Canada Business Corporations Act. The change is being made primarily for tax purposes. "  way cool video , that river looks very familiar????
I think they are from London, Ont.  Pam
Yeah, really good find!  But grammar awareness rears it's ugly head.  The video says "Make Tim Horton proud", not "Make Tim Horton's proud".
